class.name: SxVirtualControls
class.description:
A simple virtual controls module. + You only need to create a new scene, inheriting from `SxVirtualControls`, and then instancing your controls in it (adding <<_sxvirtualbutton>>s and <<_sxvirtualjoystick>>s). + On buttons, you can affect an action key (mapped in the Input Map), and on joysticks, you can affect 4 actions keys, one for each direction. + You have 3 samples at your disposal in the plugin.
image::./images/nodes/SxVirtualControls.gif[]

constants.constant: Only display the controls on a mobile environment.
Always display the controls, in desktop or mobile.
